name: Math game - Numbers
description:
Math games is a mind workout app, based on block puzzle games, where you have to slide math numbers and signs, to solve the ultimate educational puzzle and get smarter.

Math puzzles for the brain :

Our brain workout game will amaze you and tease your brain, Solve our prodigy math game and boost your IQ, memory and Get smarter.

Cool math games for prodigy kids :

We have designed our math game to be cool and educational for kids as for adults, fun and challenging.

The game contains 5 packs of math puzzles from the beginner level to the master level difficulty. Each pack has 200 puzzles. 1000 gameplay in total. And the more puzzles you solve the more it gets harder.

How to play :
- Drag math signs and numbers to the appropriate place to solve the connected equations.
- If you find yourself blocked, You can use the hint system.

Arithmetic operations:

Addition
Subtraction
Multiplication
Division

We have developed our brain game for kids and for adults and we hope it will amaze you and be your best brain workout game, where logic, thinking and math meet fun ,enjoyment, amusement and lighthearted pleasure.

Math games are the best brain workout and brain teasers.
